title: Exercise training improves diabetic renal injury by reducing fetuin-A, oxidative stress and inflammation in type 2 diabetic rats
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Shadan Saberi, Majid Askaripour, Mohammad Khaksari, Mohammad Amin Rajizadeh, Mohammad Abbas Bejeshk, Mohammad Akhbari, Elham Jafari, Kayvan Khoramipour
